meanings.definition: In a manner resembling a mountain.
meanings.sent1: The little ant climbed mountainously up the hill.
meanings.sent2: She hiked mountainously to the top of the steep slope.
meanings.sent3: The balloon floated mountainously in the sky, pretending to be a mountain.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed mountainously through the vast canyon.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed mountainously against the rocky shore.

meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree, like a mountain.
meanings.sent1: The snow mountainously covered the entire landscape overnight.
meanings.sent2: The trees mountainously grew taller and taller each year.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream melted mountainously under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room mountainously, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The population of the city mountainously increased over the past decade.
